Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Texas \Tex"as\, n. A structure on the hurricane deck of a steamer, containing the pilot house, officers' cabins, etc. [Western U. S.] --Knight. [1913 Webster]
Texas n : the second largest state; located in southwestern United States on the Gulf of Mexico [syn: {Lone-Star State}, {TX}]
